changeSet.author: dmikryukov
changeSet.comment: Display more WES metrics on the WES sanity check page
changeSet.sql: -- Add QC Result Type for POOL_MEDIAN_VAF and POOL_MEDIAN_MOTIF_BUCKET INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`qc_type` (`category`, `description`, `name`, `ismultisample`) VALUES ('SAMPLE', 'Median variant allele frequency within 16-plex pool', 'POOL_MEDIAN_VAF', 0), ('SAMPLE', 'Median motif bucket ID for 16-plex pool', 'POOL_MEDIAN_MOTIF_BUCKET', 0);
